name: Pixelgotchi - Extra Credits Jam - 6
description:
Tamagotchi style game for "Extra Credits Game Jam  6". 

Theme: Take Care

The game is a demo, it also was developed in half the time of the jam due to personal reasons, only has one creature and its evolution is quickly accelerated.

  • First Stage: Poke the egg
  • Second Stage: Play with Baby Zoey
  • Third Stage: Play for a day, mantain it happy 
  • Fourth Stage (Not Implemented) : dies of old after a month.
  • Lose: Hunger or Happiness depletes.

My idea was to learn about 2d animation with unity bones, and I consider it a success :D

Development and Art: Maximiliano Rejlis

Background Music: Federico Feld
